body: I don't particularly like or dislike femdom, but this is such a breath of fresh air. All the other girls before is basically one girl with different skins. Also lol, looks at all the bitches crying in the comments cuz their self-insert character got dominated. Y'all have problem with her "blackmailing", yet somehow totally okay with him fucking underage girls, raping a student in the first book and commit adultery multiple times? Admit it, you just hate the girl because she didn't succumb to his dick, stop being such pretentious hypocrites.
this ain't it chief
This type of shit is a big turnoff and I like yanderes so that's saying something. When they get manipulative and start with the blackmail, be it man or woman I can't get a hard on let alone fap
This is refreshing :D
I felt sorry for the mc
Well.. I don't like S@M but I'm trying to read all chapters so.. I have no choice 😂
This one was a total turn off for me. Her character was just just too much of a bitch

Liking what you like or not, this chapter was utter garbage for the sole reason that she threatened to ruin him in regards to his past to get her way. Sadistic enjoyment in the bedroom is neither here nor there, but being a blackmailing whore is a different matter. Worst girl. Manipulative bitch. I hate when ethier gender does that. Anyone in fact. If that's what you fall to then you're a fucking horrible person. Fuck the guy in this comment section that tried to defend such a disgusting louse.

I prefer Yukina later on in the series. This version of her is honestly just not attractive nor a interesting character. In my opinion of course. Great twist though! I'll give Distance that much, this surely threw me the fuck off XD
SGhost Yeah I think that was just a throwaway account just to stir up something. Why else would they bring up "that" topic here of all places?
LOL
Why'd he go so far as to bark though..? lol

@SlamJim Everyone has their own tastes and this whole site is dedicated to sexual fantasy so wtf are you on about? You can "diversify" the harem in any way you want, but that doesn't mean people are gonna like it. Nothing wrong if you like that kinda thing, and I know many do, but it was definitely a 180 from what happened thus far and people have been following the series precisely BECAUSE they like what they've seen... up to this point anyway. 

You're trying to act like it's wrong to be disappointed by this. It's not a big deal imo, but I agree that this girl is my least favourite and it's simply because I'm not too into that. I never expected to like all girls equally but I never expected to be turned off by one either  (I've liked femdom manga in the past btw this one just missed the mark I guess). Also please tell me you weren't serious with the "can't handle a strong female" shit...
@Slamjim So what? It's not that people don't want diversity. It's just obvious that he didn't like being treated like that, compared to the girls, Personally, I've never been into S&M.
Goddamn!Kuroda got own!~This is the first time I've seen him like that XD Kinda like this progress tho~It's all good~

@Whiners You guys are like idiocy incarnate. Were you expecting every girl to behave the same and be putty in Kuroda's hands? That's not how you diversify a harem. Yukina's not my favorite, but I'm glad she's not some cardboard cutout of any of the girls we already had. What Kuroda got was a taste of his own medicine, and you're all mad because you're all wannabe-alphas and can't handle a strong female who doesn't conform to your sexual fantasy.
Worst girl confirmed.
Noooooooo dont faken do this @DISTANCE DONT MAKE HIM CRY DAMMIT!
Dude my main alpha man got trained.  Booooo
i also dont like this girl at all she is worst and not that good also man its been a while i kinda ofrgot the characters a bit i need to read it again
Best girl ❤
I don't like this chick at all. Worst girl in the entire expanded harem.
Worst grill confirmed
Fallen far from grace my friend.
It's always the doujin artists that have the kinkiest fetishes.
I dont get this
Woof woof ❤
